protein.specific_function: Unwinds duplex DNA with 5'-3' polarity. Has single-strand DNA-dependent ATPase and DNA helicase activities. Prefers ATP and dATP as substrates. During S phase, may facilitate cellular recovery from replication stress.

go_class.description: single-stranded DNA-dependent ATP-dependent DNA helicase activity
DNA replication, synthesis of RNA primer

reference.reference_text: Taneja P, Gu J, Peng R, Carrick R, Uchiumi F, Ott RD, Gustafson E, Podust VN, Fanning E: A dominant-negative mutant of human DNA helicase B blocks the onset of chromosomal DNA replication. J Biol Chem. 2002 Oct 25;277(43):40853-61. Epub 2002 Aug 13.
